title: Thoughts after Jordan Peterson's CBC Interview on Polarization and the Far Right
description:
Why does he talk to people on the far right? What is next after his great media week? 

CBC Interview https://youtu.be/0BoOdMx_zDU

The Strange Persistence of Guilt http://www.iasc-culture.org/THR/THR_article_2017_Spring_McClay.php 

JBP on Jesus Creed http://www.patheos.com/blogs/jesuscreed/2018/01/29/jordan-petersons-12-rules/ 

Sacramento Meet-up https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/events/247190452/ 

Inland Empire Buckos https://www.meetup.com/Jordan-Peterson-Bucko-Roundup
